page.title: 01Tongue Village Sutherland
page.content: Tongue Village, Sutherland This block includes most of the village of Tongue, a small group of houses on the edge of the Kyle of Tongue. Ben Loyal, the Queen of Scottish mountains, guards the southern end, Ben Hope is to the west. There is a Post Office cum general store in the village, two hotels and numerous bed & breakfast establish ments, a small two-teacher primary school, a village hall and a one- officer Police Station. On the single- track road which follows the Kyle there is a camping & caravan site. Fishing permits are available from the Post Office and Pony Trekking is offered by the Adventure Centre. Var ious functions are held throughout the year in the Village Hall e.g. sales, dances. discoes,concerts.
